title: From virtual reality to advanced robotics... New tech lounge to open in Dubai
text:
From virtual reality to advanced robotics... New tech lounge to open in Dubai Article By Tamara Pupic Sunday, 4 October 2015 8:51 AM 
A successful London-based tech innovation lounge is due to open its first regional branch in Dubai this month. 
The Flux Innovation Lounge, developed by interactive technology group Engage Works and brand design agency StartJG, will launch in the Arenco Tower in Dubai Media City. 
Designed to inspire leading creative minds, the lounge will showcase multiple technologies from virtual reality to advanced robotics. 
The venue is built to stimulate invention and to expose for the first time how the latest hi-tech can affect all businesses and our working lives today and in the future. 
The lounge will be open for tours, workshops, networking and small scale events. 
Speaking about the launch, Steve Blyth, founder and CEO of Engage Works, commented: “Flux Innovation Lounge has had a phenomenal response in London and brands are increasingly recognising the power of technology as an enabler to better connect and engage with their employees and customers. 
“From robots to augmented reality, Flux Innovation Lounge showcases the most innovative solutions the industry can offer. 
Mike Curtis, CEO of StartJG, added that with Dubai’s reputation as a destination for some of the most dynamic retail businesses in the world and the city’s creative community, it was always open to new and immersive ways to engage consumers. 
“The growing appetite for engaging brand experiences makes Dubai a natural home for Flux Innovation Lounge,” he said. “Being heralded as the second most important global international shopping destination for the fourth consecutive year, makes Dubai a priority market in the field of innovative consumer interaction. 
“Flux Innovation Lounge will help to showcase the potential for technology and demonstrate how brands can produce disruptive experiences, further cementing Dubai’s reputation for attracting shoppers and businesses from around the globe.”
